text: get more on that breaking news a
shootout to court in Moscow let's go
over to our correspondent Sarah
Rainsford who joins me from the Russian
capital answer what do we know
well quite an extraordinary incident we
know that three people have been shot
dead in this Moscow courthouse and that
several people have been injured there's
a number of official bodies here has
been making statements from the police
to the Investigative Committee and they
all seem to agree that what happened is
that five suspects who are on trial in a
murder case or a high-profile murder
case here were being transported to the
courtroom by bailiffs they were in a
list at the time that one of the five
suspects attempted to strangle one of
the bailiffs apparently the others
apparently tried to overpower a second
bailiff and to get hold of a weapon and
that when these men then tried to escape
there was a shootout with police
officers inside the courtroom in which
three of the the suspects were killed
and two people I understand
fairly seriously injured so quite
extraordinary scenes as I say and these
men is unclear how they were able to to
attack or to try to overpower these
bailiffs given that in all the trials
I've been to that are involving murder
cases or high-security cases these
people are normally moved around wearing
handcuffs so it's at this point it's
unclear how this was able to happen at
all yeah I'm just looking the pictures
that the court building it looks big it
was fairly well secured you what what is
security light within these buildings
well I think a lot of trials here and
even for the most low-profile trials
Security's extremely tight there are
bailiffs armed bailiffs in all hearings
a bit kind and certainly people are
escorted to and from court by these
armed men so they're usually in
handcuffs so as I say it's unusual first
of all for them to be using a lift as
far as I understand
an unusual that someone in handcuffs
should be able to overpower and to take
weapons off armed guards obviously the
response was very quick and the police
have been very quick to justify their
response they say there will be an
investigation but they believe they use
all the proper methods and all the
proper procedures but as I say three
people were killed
the shootout now just a bit about this
the gang themselves this this gang were
accused of of hijacking essentially cars
back in 2013 2014 on a main road out of
Moscow now the allegation is that they
were stopping cars apparently at random
on that main highway and that they were
killing the drivers and the passengers
inside those cars though it's never been
entirely clear what their motive was
nothing appeared to have been stolen
from the vehicles at the time so a
rather mysterious case and apparently
nine people were involved accused in
that trial five of them were supposed to
be in court today for this hearing as I
say three of them have now been shot
dead Sarah thank you very much
